main.description: A collection/group of hypercerts that have a specific property.

shortDescription.description: A short description of this collection

coverPhoto.description: The cover photo of this collection (either in URI format or in a blob).

claims.description: Array of claims with their associated weights in this collection

createdAt.description: Client-declared timestamp when this record was originally created

claim.description: A strong reference to a hypercert claim record. This claim must conform to the lexicon org.hypercerts.claim.record

weight.description: The weight/importance of this hypercert claim in the collection (a percentage from 0-100, stored as a string to avoid float precision issues). The total claim weights should add up to 100.
